str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
Joseph, a proper name. Of Hebrew origin; Joseph, the name of seven Israelites.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To end, finish, die, complete. From a presumed derivative of teleo; to finish life, i.e. Expire.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a derivative of mneme; to exercise memory, i.e. Recollect; by implication, to punish; also to rehearse.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) an exit, going out, departure from a place; the exodus, (b) death. From ek and hodos; an exit, i.e. death.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; Israel, the adopted name of Jacob, including his descendants.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To give orders (injunctions, instructions, commands). From en and the base of telos; to enjoin.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A bone. Or contracted ostoun of uncertain affinity; a bone.
